这种猴脸兰花曾经归在三尖兰属(Masdevallia)中，在1978年的时候独立了出来, 归入小龙兰属(Dracula),也因此被称为小龙兰、猴面小 …

means.word_mean: 1. any of numerous orchids of the genus Masdevallia; tufted evergreen often diminutive plants whose flowers in a remarkable range of colors usually resemble a tricorn with sepals fused at the base to form a tube
